short_summary: Provide cloud professional services and thought leadership, including migration and transfer services, database and analytics services, machine learning, and security services
description: The Request for Proposal is seeking to pre-qualify proponents for the provision of cloud professional services and thought leadership. Proponents will provide services such as cloud migration, database and analytics, machine learning, security, and IT professional services. Proponents must demonstrate their capability and expertise in delivering cloud professional services. The Request for Proposal includes a detailed RFP package, evaluation criteria, and contract terms.
full_summary:
# Request for Pre-Qualification for Cloud Professional Services
=============================================

## Solicitation Details
-------------------

*   Solicitation Number: PS23-AG-013
*   Reference Number: MX-42851773113
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Publication Date: August 31, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: September 25, 2023 at 2:00 PM CST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: Not Applicable
*   Expected Contract End Date: Not Applicable
*   Status: Expired

## Introduction
--------------

The Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is issuing a Request for Pre-Qualification (RFP) for Cloud Professional Services. The RFP seeks to add proponents to a pre-qualified list of service providers who will offer expertise and thought leadership in cloud computing.

## RFP Scope
-------------

FCC requires a range of services, including but not limited to:

*   Migration and transfer services
*   Database and analytics services
*   Machine Learning
*   Management and governance services
*   Security, privacy, and compliance services
*   Networking services
*   Developer tools and application integration services
*   Cloud native application development
*   Maintenance and support of existing cloud infrastructure

## RFP Process Considerations
-----------------------------

*   The RFP aims to gather information from potential proponents, build expertise, and develop relationships.
*   The RFP does not constitute a call for tenders or an invitation to negotiate.
*   FCC is not committed to any subsequent action or award.

## Proponent Eligibility
----------------------

*   To participate, proponents must have expertise and experience in cloud computing.
*   Proponents must submit their proposal electronically through MERX.

## Evaluation Process
-------------------

*   Merit-based evaluation parameters will be set out in the RFP documents.
*   Proponents will be evaluated based on the relevance of their proposal, technical capacity, delivery, and leadership.

## Additional Information
----------------------

*   The RFP is available on MERX at https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2597462480/abstract?language=EN.
*   Proponents must submit their proposal electronically prior to the RFP closing date.
*   For further information, contact Adam Gottselig at procurement@fcc.ca.

Note: Retain the original formatting, but correct any errors and rephrase for clarity.  Try to keep the output to 400 words or less.
